response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value and potential for you. Given its worth of $1,500,000 to you, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $1,425,000. This offer reflects my confidence in the product's quality and its significant impact on your endeavors. Should you choose to accept this proposal, I assure you of a seamless transaction and dedicated support throughout the process. If you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1425000}
